title: Koi Tsukiyo No Himegoto
alternative_title: 恋月夜のひめごと ; 戀月夜的秘密情事 ; Koi Tsukiyo no Himegoto ; Koizukiyo no Himegoto
status: 恋月夜のひめごと ; 戀月夜的秘密情事 ; Koi Tsukiyo no Himegoto ; Koizukiyo no Himegoto
description:
Description :
        At that time, it was a crime for young girls to love...Set in the Taisho era, this is a story about the forbidden love between a young girl and a student. Tamaki is the only daughter of a wealthy family, but she's been lonely since she was small, because her parents do not care about her at all. One day, Kuroda Kageaki came to her house as a student. Gradually, Tamaki started to harbor a love for him. And yet her mother, Satoko, caused harm to Kageaki...!? Hidden there is a dreadful past! This is a sad and painful love story set in the Taisho era.
